title: T-Rex Made Me Gay:
description: Being the best archer in the village, Harper takes it upon himself to save his people when a T-Rex threatens their safety. Little does he know that the only thing the T-Rex wants is to conquer Harper and his manhood. This is a dinosaur erotic novel, adult content! 3000 word hardcore gay sex novel that includes anal sex, oral sex, cream pie, and dinosaurs.
author: Hunter Fox
